title: Tech Lead (PHP/Python/JavaScript)
description:
•	Develop backend systems (e.g, API, CMS)
•	Design architecture and develop project-based for a new project
•	Develop data analysis, algorithm when needed
•	Develop software programs from design specifications.
•	Perform code reviews, code refactoring if required.
•	To be trained or self-train on new technologies
•	Plan, execute and document unit/functional/integration tests.
•	Contributing the ideas for system architecture and design decisions.
requirements:
•	A minimum of 4 years of experience as a full-stack engineer.
•	Proven experience in working with at least a programming language (Golang, PHP, Python, Javascript/ Node JS).
•	Proven experience with system architectures (Message Queues, Load Balance, Web-server, SQL, NoSQL)
•	Willingness to learn blockchain, new technologies, new programming languages.
•	Proven experience in a web app framework (VueJS, React) is an advantage.
•	Proven experience with Linux, DevOps, Microservices is an advantage.
